entry.string: Welcome to the Help Desk. Please click a link to use the system.
entry.translation: Velcume-a tu zee Help Desk. Pleese-a cleeck a leenk tu use-a zee system.

entry.string: Your new ticket has been submitted! Please reference ticket number #(1) when referencing this issue.
entry.translation: Yuoor noo teecket hes beee soobmeetted! Pleese-a refference-a teecket noomber #(1) vhee refferenceeng thees issooe-a.
